svg.text:
TextThe year 2020 has been a STRANGE year indeed.
A tiny little virus, ..., so tiny that you couldn’t even see it... Had taken over the whole world and brought life to a standstill.
Schools were closed. Then the malls were closed. Then the parks and beaches too. Inara didn’t like it at all. She missed going to all these places, but most of all she missed going to her school.
